Data import and migration/Historical dat.id: Data import and migration/Historical data migration/index
Data import and migration/Historical dat.title: Import historical data
Data import and migration/Historical dat.description: The CometChat message import API allows application owners and admins to import existing chat messages data from any source into CometChat.

Data import and migration/Live data migr.id: Data import and migration/Live data migration/index
Data import and migration/Live data migr.title: Live data migration
Data import and migration/Live data migr.description: Upon integrating with our messaging solution, you may encounter a scenario where your application is transitioning from a homegrown chat feature to our comprehensive services. During this transition phase, a live migration process is necessary to ensure continuity of communication.

Data import and migration/Overview/index.title: Overview
Data import and migration/Overview/index.description: Data import and migration, in the context of CometChat, involves transferring your existing chat-related data from your own servers or another chat service provider to the CometChat platform. This process typically encompasses the migration of users, their messages, any chat groups, and the list of members within those groups. The goal of migration is to ensure a seamless transition and continuity of the chat service for your users.

Features/Ai-Copilot/Conversation Starter.title: Conversation Starter
Features/Ai-Copilot/Conversation Starter.description: Conversation Starter enables you to retrieve an initial message in a new conversation, often used to set the context for the conversation that is about to begin. This can be particularly useful for guiding users on how to interact within the chat or for delivering automated messages that engage users when they initiate a chat.

Features/Ai-Copilot/Conversation Summary.title: Conversation Summary
Features/Ai-Copilot/Conversation Summary.description: Conversation Summary enables the summarization of conversations using AI.

Features/Ai-Copilot/Smart Replies.title: Smart Replies
Features/Ai-Copilot/Smart Replies.description: Smart Replies enable the retrieval of an AI-generated response message within a conversation.

Features/core/index.title: Core in-app messaging features
Features/core/index.description: CometChat provides a powerful suite of messaging features. A subset of these features called 'Messaging Core' provide features which are bare minimum to build a good chat user experience.

Features/Extensions/Collaboration/1 Coll.title: Collaborative Whiteboard

Features/Extensions/Customer Support/1 C.title: Chatwoot
Features/Extensions/Customer Support/1 C.description: The Chatwoot extension makes customer support seamless for your users. Instead of having two interfaces- one for chat between users and one for chat with your support team, you can use CometChat as a front-end for your customer support use case as well!

Features/Extensions/Customer Support/2 I.title: Intercom
Features/Extensions/Customer Support/2 I.description: The Intercom extension makes customer support seamless for your users. Instead of having two interfaces- one for chat between users and one for chat with your support team, you can use CometChat as a front-end for your customer support use case as well!

Features/Extensions/index.description: We believe that building a great chat product does not consist of just voice, video and text chat. It's much more than that. And Extensions are our answer to this.

Features/Extensions/Security/1 Disappear.title: Disappearing Messages
Features/Extensions/Security/1 Disappear.description: The Disappearing Messages extension allows end-users to send messages that disappear after a certain interval of time. This extension works for both private (one-on-one) and group messages.

Features/Extensions/Security/2 End-to-en.title: End-to-End Encryption
Features/Extensions/Security/2 End-to-en.description: Ensure only your users can read what is sent and nobody in between.

Features/Extensions/User Engagement/10 M.title: Mentions
Features/Extensions/User Engagement/10 M.description: Mentions are a great way to get someone's attention in a conversation. Mentions start with the @ symbol followed by a  name.

Features/Extensions/User Engagement/11 G.title: Giphy
Features/Extensions/User Engagement/11 G.description: GIFs are a great way to change the tone or convey emotions in your conversations. Here's a guide which helps to implement Gifphy in an easy and quick way. Let's get started!

Features/Extensions/User Engagement/12 T.title: Tenor
Features/Extensions/User Engagement/12 T.description: GIFs are a great way to change the tone or convey emotions in your conversations. Here's a guide which helps to implement Tenor in an easy and quick way. Let's get started!

Features/Extensions/User Engagement/13 G.description: Gfycat ceased their operations recently. This extension is no longer available.

Features/Extensions/User Engagement/14 R.title: Reminders
Features/Extensions/User Engagement/14 R.description: Create reminders for messages or anything else.

Features/Extensions/User Engagement/2 Sm.title: Smart Replies
Features/Extensions/User Engagement/2 Sm.description: The Smart Reply extension allows you to show quick reply options to a user so that they can easily respond to a message. We will always suggest 3 options; one positive, one neutral and one negative. We also add a category, in case you want to skip some suggestions.

Features/Extensions/User Engagement/3 Me.title: Message Translation
Features/Extensions/User Engagement/3 Me.description: The Message Translation extension helps you translate messages into multiple languages.

Features/Extensions/User Engagement/4 Em.title: Emojis (Deprecated)
Features/Extensions/User Engagement/4 Em.description: This extension is outdated as all the major browsers natively support emojis.

Features/Extensions/User Engagement/5 Po.title: Polls
Features/Extensions/User Engagement/5 Po.description: Polls let you quickly record the opinions directly in the Conversations and also view the results.

Features/Extensions/User Engagement/6 Re.title: Reactions
Features/Extensions/User Engagement/6 Re.description: Reactions are the ability to react to an individual message with a specific emotion, quickly showing acknowledgment or expressing how you feel in a lightweight way.

Features/Extensions/User Engagement/7 St.title: Stipop
Features/Extensions/User Engagement/7 St.description: Learn how to integrate stickers by Stipop in your app.

Features/Extensions/User Engagement/8 St.title: Stickers
Features/Extensions/User Engagement/8 St.description: The Stickers Extension is more like an image manager which allows you to quickly add/remove stickers directly from the dashboard.

Features/Extensions/User Experience/avat.title: Avatars
Features/Extensions/User Experience/avat.description: This extension allows the end-users to upload an avatar image for their profile.

Features/Extensions/User Experience/bitl.title: Bitly
Features/Extensions/User Experience/bitl.description: Learn how to minify the long website links in your text messages using Bitly.

Features/Extensions/User Experience/link.title: Link Preview
Features/Extensions/User Experience/link.description: The Link Preview extension will help you show a preview of the web page for every link in your message.

Features/Extensions/User Experience/mess.title: Message Shortcuts
Features/Extensions/User Experience/mess.description: The Message Shortcuts extension enables your users to send each other predefined messages.

Features/Extensions/User Experience/rich.title: Rich Media Preview
Features/Extensions/User Experience/rich.description: The Rich Media Preview Extension allows the developer to generate rich preview panels for all the popular sites. This extension fetches the first URL from the message for the generation of a preview.

Features/Extensions/User Experience/thum.title: Thumbnail Generation
Features/Extensions/User Experience/thum.description: The Thumbnail Generation extension will help you generate a thumbnail preview of an image or a video message.

Features/Extensions/User Experience/tiny.title: TinyURL
Features/Extensions/User Experience/tiny.description: Learn how to minify the long website links in your text messages using TinyURL.

Features/Extensions/User Experience/voic.title: Voice Transcription
Features/Extensions/User Experience/voic.description: Voice transcription extension allows you to convert an audio message into text.

overview/index.title: What is CometChat?
overview/index.description: CometChat is a comprehensive communications platform that empowers businesses to seamlessly integrate real-time chat, voice and video calling functionalities. These integrations can be done picking up the implementation methods that align best with your goals.

Webhooks/Legacy Webhooks/Managing trigge.title: Managing triggers
Webhooks/Legacy Webhooks/Managing trigge.description: Webhook management and configuration of triggers can be handled via CometChat's dashboard or by utilizing the Management APIs.

Webhooks/Legacy Webhooks/Overview/index.title: Overview
Webhooks/Legacy Webhooks/Overview/index.description: Webhooks faciliate real-time event-driven communication with your system, enabling you to receive HTTP POST requests from CometChat that carry details about different events. Utilizing webhooks is beneficial for creating customized services, such as SMS or email notifications, etc.
